## Mid-term projections {.tabset}
```{r setup, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, cache.path = "~/tmp/cache")
if (!exists("projections_file")) projections_file <- "projections.RData"
if (!exists("make.plots")) source(file.path(Rfile.loc, "plot_funcs.R"))
load(file.path(out.dir, projections_file))
```

### Infection incidence {.tabset}

#### By region
```{r reg-medterm-inf}
make.plots(infections, by = "region", project.forwards = TRUE)
```

#### By age
```{r age-medterm-inf}
make.plots(infections, by = "age", project.forwards = TRUE)
```

### Deaths {.tabset}

#### By region
```{r reg-medterm-death}
make.plots(deaths, by = "region", x.label = "Date of death", project.forwards = TRUE)
```

#### By age
```{r age-medterm-death}
make.plots(deaths, by = "age", x.label = "Date of death", project.forwards = TRUE)
```

```{r eval=exists("prevalence"), child='prev-proj-report.Rmd'}
save.image("temp2.RData")
```
